dn21:1.3.3: jalatisu → jālatissu (bj); jalatassu (sya-all, km); jalitassu (pts-vp-pli1ed) | jhāyatisu → jhāyatissu (bj); jhāyatassu (sya-all, km); pajjhāyitassu (pts-vp-pli1ed)
dn21:1.4.2: tadantaraṃ → tadanantara (bj); tadanantaraṃ (sya-all, km, pts-vp-pli1ed, mr)
dn21:1.6.3: na ca pana → neva pana (sya-all, km)
dn21:1.11.6: itthittaṃ → itthicittaṃ (cck, pts-vp-pli1ed); itthīcittaṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed, km) | purisattaṃ → purisacittaṃ (sya-all, km, pts-vp-pli1ed)
dn21:1.12.16: Buddhassa dhammāni paṭiggahesuṃ → buddhassa dhammaṃ na paṭiggahesuṃ (sya-all, km, pts-vp-pli1ed)
dn21:1.12.37: byāyāma → viyāyamāma (bj, sya-all, km, pts-vp-pli1ed) | viyāyāma → byāyamāma (bj); vigāyāma (sya-all, km); vitāyāma (pts-vp-pli1ed)
dn21:1.12.45: sannāni guṇāni → sandānaguṇāni (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed); santāni guṇāni (sya-all, km)
dn21:2.1.1: devānamindo bhagavatā imaṃ bhagavantaṃ → devānamindo bhagavantaṃ imaṃ (pts-vp-pli1ed)
dn21:2.7.4: pana → yañca pana (sya-all, km); yañca pana (pts-vp-pli1ed)
dn21:2.7.25: samupabyūḷho → samūpabyuḷho (cck); samupabyuḷho (sya1ed, sya2ed, km); samūpabbūḷho (pts-vp-pli1ed)
dn21:2.9.33: Tvameva asi → tvameva sivaṃ (sya-all, km); tuvamevasi (pts-vp-pli1ed)
